mapper.select: select no, name, `desc` from category where blog_id= #{blogId }
select id, title, logo from blog where id= #{id}
select a.no from ( select * from blog t1 left join category t2 on t1.id = t2.blog_id ) a left join post b on a.no = b.category_no where a.id = #{blogId } order by b.no desc limit 1

choose.when: select t2.no, t2.title, t2.contents, t2.reg_date as regDate, t2.category_no as categoryNo from category t1, post t2 where t1.no=t2.category_no and t1.blog_id = #{blogId } and t1.no = #{categoryNo } order by t2.no desc limit 1
